text: The Penang Mutiara Beach Resort is an abandoned luxury hotel on the “glowing bay” beach in Teluk Bahang, Penang, Malaysia. The 15-story building is about 56.64 meters tall. It is owned by Tradewinds Corp Bhd, previously known as Pernas International Holdings Bhd. Famous guests included the Sultan of Selangor and former Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. ==References== Category:Penang Category:Skyscrapers in Malaysia
title: Penang Mutiara Beach Resort
